channel.title: zoo on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in zoo on Barefoot Rob

item.title: zoo
item.description: 1 o'clock Tuesday, Christmas Eve morning (transcribed from Book Two of my diary) Today, I'll take Tammy to the airport and then go to Cheri's house & pick her up and bring her back here & we'll go to the zoo and then at 5:30PM, ma will pick us up and we'll all go the Emerson church Christmas Eve service and then I'll take Cheri home & meet ma back in Tomball.
